title: Invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference on 2.49.1
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: 2.49.1-stable. Pre-built binary

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash: 205eeda01fd8f8a2956276d6760b9298f70bd18f

Erigon Command (with flags/config): erigon --chain=mainnet  --pprof --rpc.gascap 500000000 --nat=stun  --authrpc.addr=0.0.0.0 --authrpc.vhosts=* --http --http.addr 0.0.0.0 --http.corsdomain * --http.port 8545 --http.api eth,trace,net,engine,web3 --http.vhosts * --port 30303 --maxpeers 50 --txpool.nolocals --txpool.accountslots 32 --txpool.globalslots 8192 --txpool.accountqueue 128 --txpool.globalqueue 2048 --txpool.lifetime 3h0m0s --datadir /mnt/local/ethereum --ws    --authrpc.jwtsecret /mnt/local/ethereum/engine-jwt.key

Consensus Layer: Teku 23.9.0

Consensus Layer Command (with flags/config): teku --log-destination=console --data-base-path=/mnt/local/ethereum --network=mainnet --ee-endpoint=http://localhost:8551 --eth1-endpoint=http://localhost:8545 --ee-jwt-secret-file=/mnt/local/ethereum/engine-jwt.key --rest-api-enabled=true --rest-api-host-allowlist=* --rest-api-interface=0.0.0.0 --rest-api-port=5051 --metrics-enabled=true --metrics-host-allowlist=* --metrics-interface=0.0.0.0 --metrics-port=8008 --metrics-block-timing-tracking-enabled=true

Chain/Network: Ethereum mainnet

#### Expected behaviour

Erigon doesn't crash and syncs to head.

#### Actual behaviour

Erigon crashes with:

```
Sep 15 15:15:05 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
Sep 15 15:15:05 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x0 pc=0x14e1a87]
```

In this case there's a number of warnings beforehand about a timestamp discrepancy between the index file and segment file, and other errors, as seen in this log excerpt leading up to the panic:

```
Sep 15 15:13:19 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [WARN] [09-15|15:13:19.777] Index file has timestamp before segment file, will be recreated segfile=/mnt/local/ethereum/sna>
Sep 15 15:13:19 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [WARN] [09-15|15:13:19.777] Index file has timestamp before segment file, will be recreated segfile=/mnt/local/ethereum/sna>
Sep 15 15:13:19 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [WARN] [09-15|15:13:19.778] Index file has timestamp before segment file, will be recreated segfile=/mnt/local/ethereum/sna>
Sep 15 15:13:19 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [WARN] [09-15|15:13:19.778] Index file has timestamp before segment file, will be recreated segfile=/mnt/local/ethereum/sna>
Sep 15 15:13:19 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [WARN] [09-15|15:13:19.779] Index file has timestamp before segment file, will be recreated segfile=/mnt/local/ethereum/sna>
Sep 15 15:13:19 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [WARN] [09-15|15:13:19.779] Index file has timestamp before segment file, will be recreated segfile=/mnt/local/ethereum/sna>
Sep 15 15:13:19 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [WARN] [09-15|15:13:19.780] Index file has timestamp before segment file, will be recreated segfile=/mnt/local/ethereum/sna>
Sep 15 15:13:19 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [WARN] [09-15|15:13:19.780] Index file has timestamp before segment file, will be recreated segfile=/mnt/local/ethereum/sna>
Sep 15 15:13:19 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [WARN] [09-15|15:13:19.781] Index file has timestamp before segment file, will be recreated segfile=/mnt/local/ethereum/sna>
Sep 15 15:13:19 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [WARN] [09-15|15:13:19.782] Index file has timestamp before segment file, will be recreated segfile=/mnt/local/ethereum/sna>
Sep 15 15:13:19 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [WARN] [09-15|15:13:19.783] Index file has timestamp before segment file, will be recreated segfile=/mnt/local/ethereum/sna>
Sep 15 15:13:19 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [WARN] [09-15|15:13:19.790] Index file has timestamp before segment file, will be recreated segfile=/mnt/local/ethereum/sna>
Sep 15 15:13:31 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [EROR] [09-15|15:13:31.752] [txpool] flush is local history          err="table: PoolTransaction, err: mdbx_cursor_put: MDB>
Sep 15 15:13:39 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [INFO] [09-15|15:13:39.731] [1/12 Snapshots] Indexing                progress="v1-001000-001500-transactions.seg=32%, v1-00>
Sep 15 15:13:47 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [EROR] [09-15|15:13:47.346] [txpool] flush is local history          err="table: PoolTransaction, err: mdbx_cursor_put: MDB>
Sep 15 15:13:59 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [INFO] [09-15|15:13:59.730] [1/12 Snapshots] Indexing                progress="v1-001000-001500-transactions.seg=50%, v1-00>
Sep 15 15:14:02 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [EROR] [09-15|15:14:02.950] [txpool] flush is local history          err="table: PoolTransaction, err: mdbx_cursor_put: MDB>
Sep 15 15:14:16 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [INFO] [09-15|15:14:16.141] [txpool] stat                            pending=34 baseFee=5 queued=313 alloc=8.4GB sys=14.3GB
Sep 15 15:14:18 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [EROR] [09-15|15:14:18.554] [txpool] flush is local history          err="table: PoolTransaction, err: mdbx_cursor_put: MDB>
Sep 15 15:14:19 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [INFO] [09-15|15:14:19.733] [1/12 Snapshots] Indexing                progress="v1-001000-001500-transactions.seg=50%, v1-00>
Sep 15 15:14:34 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [EROR] [09-15|15:14:34.158] [txpool] flush is local history          err="table: PoolTransaction, err: mdbx_cursor_put: MDB>
Sep 15 15:14:39 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [INFO] [09-15|15:14:39.733] [1/12 Snapshots] Indexing                progress="v1-001000-001500-transactions.seg=50%, v1-00>
Sep 15 15:14:49 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [EROR] [09-15|15:14:49.765] [txpool] flush is local history          err="table: PoolTransaction, err: mdbx_cursor_put: MDB>
Sep 15 15:14:59 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [INFO] [09-15|15:14:59.730] [1/12 Snapshots] Indexing                progress="v1-001000-001500-transactions.seg=50%, v1-00>
Sep 15 15:15:05 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
Sep 15 15:15:05 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: [signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x0 pc=0x14e1a87]
```

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Attempt to sync to head after upgrading Erigon to 2.49.1, with an existing DB created with 2.43.1.

#### Backtrace

````
Sep 15 15:15:05 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: goroutine 2587 [running]:
Sep 15 15:15:05 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/txpool.(*TxPool).flushLocked(0xc0b184a800, {0x2eba900?, 0xc34b254720})
Sep 15 15:15:05 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]:         /root/go/pkg/mod/github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20230911021829-c23d49fb5d32/txpool/pool.go:1614 +0xa7
Sep 15 15:15:05 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/txpool.(*TxPool).flush.func1({0x2eba900?, 0xc34b254720})
Sep 15 15:15:05 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]:         /root/go/pkg/mod/github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20230911021829-c23d49fb5d32/txpool/pool.go:1598 +0x4b
Sep 15 15:15:05 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/kv/mdbx.(*MdbxKV).Update(0x501010001?, {0x2e8fda0?, 0xc001418190?}, 0xc34b220580)
Sep 15 15:15:05 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]:         /root/go/pkg/mod/github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20230911021829-c23d49fb5d32/kv/mdbx/kv_mdbx.go:670 +0xb6
Sep 15 15:15:05 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/txpool.(*TxPool).flush(0xc0b184a800, {0x2e8fda0, 0xc001418190}, {0x2ea1a58, 0xc0b496a1a0})
Sep 15 15:15:05 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]:         /root/go/pkg/mod/github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20230911021829-c23d49fb5d32/txpool/pool.go:1597 +0x21f
Sep 15 15:15:05 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/txpool.MainLoop({0x2e8fda0?, 0xc001418190}, {0x2ea1a58, 0xc0b496a1a0}, {0x0?, 0xc09beb600>
Sep 15 15:15:05 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]:         /root/go/pkg/mod/github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20230911021829-c23d49fb5d32/txpool/pool.go:1483 +0x36a
Sep 15 15:15:05 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]: created by github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/eth.New
Sep 15 15:15:05 ip-10-0-69-130 erigon[407070]:         /go/src/github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/eth/backend.go:656 +0x3ff1
````

> Please remove datadir/txpool folder

I confirm this fix works here, `v2.49.2`, upgraded from ` v2.48.0`
Haven't seen this again since the removal of that dir.
This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.

performed_via_github_app.name: GitHub Actions
